Package org.cesecore.util.query

Class QueryGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cesecore.util.query.QueryGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    public final class QueryGenerator
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Class responsible for Query Generation. Queries will be generated according to provided Criteria. Each criteria (composing Terms) will be subdued to validation. For usage examples @see QueryCriteriaTest
    Version:
    $Id: QueryGenerator.java 27999 2018-01-18 09:17:13Z mikekushner $
    See Also:
